# Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

##  Our Pledge

We pledge to make participation in this project a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of:
- age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity/expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity.

We are committed to fostering a friendly, safe, and inclusive environment.


##  Expected Behavior

- Use welcoming and inclusive language
- Be respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences
- Gracefully accept constructive criticism
- Focus on what is best for the project


##  Unacceptable Behavior

- Harassment, insults, or discriminatory jokes
- Publishing private info of others without permission
- Trolling or deliberate disruption
- Unwelcome sexual attention or advances



##  Reporting

If you witness or experience unacceptable behavior, report it by email:

 `hi@abhizaik.com`

Reports are confidential and will be handled with discretion.


##  Enforcement

Project maintainers have the right to:
- Remove comments, code, or contributions that violate this code
- Ban any contributor for serious or repeated violations

---

_This Code of Conduct is adapted from the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/), version 2.1._
